Partnering with your business to design web products

We use a user centered and research driven approach to design elegant web products

GET IN TOUCH

Wether you’re just getting started with your product or thinking about improving it, we’ll partner with you to identify where to get started and how to proceed.

What we do

Design research

  • Understanding your business and identifying your audience

  • Problem solving through collecting insights using qualitative research methods

UX/UI design

  • Ideation, user flows, sketching and wire framing

  • Visual design

  • Creating interactive prototypes

Usability testing

  • Validating designs through user testing

  • Identifying critical issues to fix

Product audits (for existing products)

  • Reviewing product usability and user experience through expert review and user testing

  • Create prioritized list of next steps
